title: App Launch and Theme Selection with Biometric Authentication
description: Verify app launch flow where user selects a theme and successfully authenticates using biometric security.

steps.description: Launch the Rojnivis Flutter Journal app
The theme selection screen is displayed with multiple themes
Select a theme
Authenticate using biometric security (e.g. fingerprint or face recognition)
Authentication succeeds and user is navigated to the main journal management screen

title: Failed Biometric Authentication Blocks Access
description: Verify that the app blocks access if biometric authentication fails.

steps.description: Launch the Rojnivis Flutter Journal app
Select a theme
Attempt biometric authentication with invalid biometric data
Authentication fails and user remains on authentication screen with error message

title: Create New Journal Entry with Text and Rich Media
description: Verify creating a new journal entry including text content and adding supported rich media such as images and sketches.

steps.description: Navigate to journal management screen
Click 'Create New Entry'
Add text content to the entry
Insert an image into the entry
Add a sketch to the entry
Save the journal entry
Journal entry is saved and listed with its text and media content visible

title: Search Journal Entries with Advanced Filters
description: Verify searching journal entries by keywords and applying advanced filters including category and date ranges.

steps.description: Navigate to journal entries list
Enter search keyword
Apply category filter
Apply date range filter
Execute search
Search results only include journal entries matching the keyword and filters

title: AI-Powered Smart Categorization Suggestion
description: Verify that AI suggests appropriate categories for newly created or existing journal entries.

steps.description: Create or select an existing journal entry with descriptive content
Trigger AI smart categorization suggestion
AI suggests relevant categories based on entry content
Accept suggested category
Suggested category is applied to the journal entry and visible in its metadata

title: Create and Manage Hierarchical Tags for Journal Entries
description: Verify that users can create hierarchical tags and assign them to journal entries.

steps.description: Navigate to category management section
Create a parent tag
Create one or more child tags under the parent tag
Hierarchy of tags is correctly displayed
Assign hierarchical tags to a journal entry
Journal entry shows assigned hierarchical tags with parent-child relation

title: Interactive Mindmap Node Creation and Customization
description: Verify that users can create mindmap nodes with different styles and customize node appearance.

steps.description: Open the mindmap visualization feature
Create new mindmap nodes connected to existing nodes
Apply different node styles (color, shape, size) to nodes
Nodes appear with selected styles and connections are visually correct

title: Mindmap Auto-Layout and Zoom Functionality
description: Verify that the mindmap supports automatic layout rearrangement and zooming in and out.

steps.description: Open a complex mindmap with multiple nodes
Trigger auto-layout algorithm
Mindmap nodes rearranged automatically for optimal layout
Use zoom controls or pinch gesture to zoom in and out
Mindmap zooms smoothly and maintains node and text clarity

title: Export Mindmap to Supported Formats
description: Verify that the mindmap can be exported correctly to supported file formats like PNG, PDF or SVG.

steps.description: Open mindmap export option
Select export file format (PNG, PDF, SVG)
Execute export
Exported file is generated with correct visual representation of the mindmap

title: AI Quick Questions Prompt Generation
description: Verify that the AI Quick Questions module generates relevant journaling prompts using Gemini AI.

steps.description: Navigate to AI Quick Questions module
Request a journaling prompt
A meaningful and relevant journaling prompt is generated by Gemini AI
Generate multiple prompts consecutively
Each prompt is unique and contextually appropriate

title: Automated Note Summarization Accuracy
description: Verify that the AI-powered automated summarization provides concise and meaningful summaries of journal entries.

steps.description: Select a journal entry with substantial content
Trigger AI automated summarization
Summary generated is concise, relevant, and accurately reflects the entry's content

title: Multi-Modal Text Input: OCR Extraction from Images
description: Verify that OCR correctly extracts text from image inputs and adds to journal entries.

steps.description: Create a new journal entry
Insert an image with clear printed or handwritten text
Trigger OCR text extraction
Extracted text matches the contents of the image and is editable within the journal entry

title: Voice Recording and Automatic Transcription Accuracy
description: Verify that voice recordings are transcribed automatically and accurately into text.

steps.description: Start a new journal entry
Record voice input clearly for over 30 seconds
Stop recording and wait for automatic transcription
Transcription text is generated and correctly reflects the spoken content

title: Handwriting Recognition Input and Conversion
description: Verify that handwriting input is captured and accurately converted into editable text.

steps.description: Use handwriting input mode in a new journal entry
Write legible handwriting using the stylus or finger
Trigger handwriting recognition conversion
Converted text properly matches the handwritten input

title: PDF Annotation Addition and Saving
description: Verify users can annotate PDFs within entries and save annotations successfully.

steps.description: Attach a PDF document in a journal entry
Use annotation tools to highlight, add notes or draw
Save the annotated PDF within the entry
Annotations are preserved and visible when reopening the entry

title: Smart Collections and Advanced Filtering Functionality
description: Verify that smart collections dynamically group related notes and filters effectively narrow displayed entries.

steps.description: Create smart collection criteria (e.g. tags, categories)
Smart collection dynamically lists matching notes
Apply advanced filters such as date, category, and AI-generated tags
Displayed notes conform to applied filters

title: Cross-Referencing and Backlinking Between Notes
description: Verify users can create links between notes and view backlinks correctly.

steps.description: Open a journal entry and create a link reference to another note
Link appears clickable and navigates to the referenced note
Open referenced note and verify backlink to the original note is visible
Backlink correctly points back to the original note

title: Real-Time Collaboration with Multi-User Editing and Commenting
description: Verify that multiple users can edit and comment on a shared note simultaneously with changes synchronized.

steps.description: User A opens a shared journal note
User B opens the same shared page on a different device
User A edits text content
User B sees the update in real-time with minimal latency
User B adds a comment to the note
User A sees the comment appear live

title: Cloud Backup to Google Drive, Dropbox, and OneDrive
description: Verify cloud backup process completes successfully with supported providers and handles failures gracefully.

steps.description: Configure cloud backup settings with Google Drive
Trigger manual backup
Backup completes successfully without data loss
Repeat backup configuration and backup with Dropbox and OneDrive
Backup completes successfully with each provider
Simulate network failure during backup
Backup process reports error and offers retry option

title: Cross-Platform Synchronization Consistency
description: Verify that changes made on one device synchronize properly and consistently appear on other devices.

steps.description: Create or update journal entry on Device A
Allow synchronization to complete
Check the same entry on Device B
Entry changes made on Device A appear on Device B accurately
Edit entry on Device B and sync
Changes from Device B appear on Device A

title: App Settings Theme Morphing and UX Animation
description: Verify that changing themes triggers smooth theme morphing animations and other UX enhancements such as ripple effects and ink effects.

steps.description: Navigate to app settings
Select a different theme from the current one
Theme morphing animation occurs smoothly without UI glitches
Ripple and ink effects are visible during theme changes and user interactions

title: Performance: Verify App Startup Time under 2 Seconds
description: Measure app startup elapsed time and verify it is under 2 seconds given typical user data.

steps.description: Launch the app multiple times fresh from device home screen
Each startup time measurement is below 2 seconds

title: Performance: Verify Memory Usage Under 150MB In Normal Usage
description: Monitor memory usage during common workflows ensuring memory usage remains below 150MB.

steps.description: Perform typical user activities like creating journal entries, switching themes, using mindmap
Memory usage remains below 150MB throughout

title: Security: Validate Secure Data Storage and End-to-End Encryption
description: Verify that all user data is securely stored on device and encrypted during cloud synchronization.

steps.description: Store sensitive data such as journal entries and app settings locally
Data at rest is encrypted and inaccessible by unauthorized apps
Trigger cloud sync
Data is transmitted over secured, encrypted channels

title: Error Handling for AI Feature Failures
description: Verify app behavior when AI services (summarization, categorization, question generation) fail or return errors.

steps.description: Simulate AI service failure or network error during summarization
App shows a user-friendly error message without crashing
Repeat for smart categorization and quick questions features
Each AI failure is handled gracefully with proper user notification

title: Change Tracking and Version History in Collaboration
description: Verify that changes made to shared notes are tracked with timestamps and version history is accessible.

steps.description: Open a shared journal note
Make multiple edits with different users over time
Access change tracking or version history interface
Changes are listed with timestamps and the ability to view or revert versions
